titleStmt.title: A plaine and familiar exposition of the ninth and tenth chapters of the Prouerbs of Salomon
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] E[ast] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Paternoster-Row at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iohn Dod, Robert Cleauer.

Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
